clauses.title: Delivery Commitment
clauses.summary: DHL commits to delivering all shipments within agreed timelines with tracking.

clauses.title: Liability
clauses.summary: Liability for lost/damaged goods is limited to declared shipment value.

clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: Either party can terminate the agreement with 45 days notice.

insights.message: Pending approval may delay implementation of logistics services.
Limited liability may expose ABC Corp to financial loss if high-value shipments are damaged.

evidence.snippet: DHL will deliver all shipments within the agreed timelines with full tracking.
Liability for lost or damaged goods is limited to the declared shipment value unless otherwise agreed.
